title: POLARITIES? HOW DO THEY WORK
description:
How do polarities work? Dr. Marco Paret will answer this question and we will also see a demonstration. He is the world's leading authority in the field of non-verbal hypnosis. Traveling all around the world to share his knowledge with the students, he shows that everybody can enter in hypnosis. How? He will answer today. Watch the whole video, so you don't miss any of these non-verbal hypnosis secrets. Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info 

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
